summary: hey i'm rewatching liam's quest: full circle and Fuck, guys liam set all their ages at times when each one respectively had no...
body:
hey i’m rewatching liam’s quest: full circle and Fuck, guys

liam set all their ages at times when each one respectively had no friends bc this is a oneshot about Loving Your Friends and now, in the bodies of their once-lonely child-selves, they are surrounded by their closest friends and working together, and it’s kind of a lot, emotionally

like I know exactly what age I’d be in this situation and how grateful that girl would be to have what I have now, and there is No Doubt in my mind that each one of them knows the same thing about themselves in this one-shot–and so of course the end of this story is a foregone conclusion; I can’t imagine any one of them would not fight tooth and nail to save their friends, especially not now that they were reminded of how Incredibly Fortunate they are to have those friends in the first place.

summary: are there any critters out there who’ve read mistborn? bc I just realised a lot of similarities between Kelsier and Molly, for...
body:
are there any critters out there who’ve read mistborn?

bc I just realised a lot of similarities between Kelsier and Molly, for some reason. (spoilers for both!!)


like, not just the drama and the flair, the scars on the arms. But also how they’re both kind of assholes? (Kell more than Molly probably? maybe? I mean he did kill a LOT of people bc they were noble) bc after Hathsin Kelsier started his life over with new powers, climbing out of the pits (which could have been his death=his grave) while Molly literaly climbed out of his grave, not knowing who he was? 

and you know, lets talk about the flair? bc Molly was a literal devil wearing prada, and Kel walks around like he owns the place as well. They both appear very 

and then there’s their deaths. Both got into a fight they couldn’t win because someone took a dear person from them, and died. And gave hope to the people around them? bc most critters and the mighty nein as well, hardly seem to see Molly’s flaws, Like he’s an amazing person, while he was also kind of a dick? and then there’s Kelsier who basicaly became a god through his bullshitting? long may he reign, right?

this is in no way speculating it’s on purpose, I doubt it is, it just seemed an interesting coincidence. 

I’ve just re-read mistborn and this popped into my mind

summary: you have me back against the wall - Wanderingchronicle - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: you have me back against the wall - Wanderingchronicle - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Things come to a head.

–

Molly opens his mouth, then closes it and swallows. “I don’t know how to give you the answer you want,” he manages, and it comes out sounding far too raw for his liking.

Nott gives him a withering look. “Then don’t,” she replies, “just give me the truth.”

–

Here it is! The penultimate installment of “no choir”! Thank you all for reading!

summary: Yasha said she “looked different” after the stormlord safed her, which probably has something to do with her becoming a fallen...
body:
Yasha said she “looked different” after the stormlord safed her, which probably has something to do with her becoming a fallen asimaar and the horned devil she saw in her vision. 

I just can’t stop thinking about the fact the Ipkesh had long black hair that turns white at the tips

blog.description: I write and reblog things for my fandoms. Main focus Critical Role. Feel free to send me asks or general headcanons about characters! I have a critical role rp blog! made and role played for Yeza the halfling (chemistyeza.tumblr.com). Asks open!

summary: A prompt!  It's Critmas time and the M9 can't find Nott anywhere.  They had just about given up their search when they hear a...
question: A prompt!  It's Critmas time and the M9 can't find Nott anywhere.  They had just about given up their search when they hear a crash from the other room.  They find Not struggling to untangle herself from the wreckage of the fallen Critmas tree.  Turns out she had climbed into the tree and spent the whole day day-drinking surrounded by twinkling lights and tinsel and ornaments.  It was an amazing day and she only reluctantly came down to pee.
answer:
I feel like you wrote the story for me! It’s a short piece, but it does work quite well all on it’s own, and I really have nothing to add to it, because I genuinely like how it is at the moment. 

Maybe I’ll expand on it later? But currently I like it this way, and have nothing to add besides wanting to share it with whoever else might see.

reblog.comment:

also not sure how being condescending and trying to undermine someone's closest relationship makes them trust you but go off I guess
the rest of the group is just reminding me of my dad right now
right down to the guilt tripping
also if this is how molly act not sure I'm going to miss him too much
Oh and talking down to someone
